name: About Movies Songs Games and Life

metadata.name: Singing in the Neon Rain aka the Choice
metadata.description:
Well Folks it's a fact that life sometimes gives you rainy days, you can stay at home or you can take shelter under an umbrella ... I personally prefer to sing ...

60 frames 492 Lyers

I started the concept of this piece thinking of participating in the fantastic Neon Rain contest but obviously I was already out of time, as I continued in the narration I realized how much the current market situation has strong similarities with a bad day of rain and how reaction attitudes can in turn develop equally strong analogies ...
